disease.name: Zeltonian Respiratory Disorder
disease.description: Zeltonian Respiratory Disorder is a condition specific to Zeltrons characterized by respiratory complications and related symptoms.

treatment_plans.name: Bronchodilators
treatment_plans.description: Prescribe bronchodilator medications to help open the airways and relieve symptoms such as wheezing and shortness of breath.

treatment_plans.name: Steroid Therapy
treatment_plans.description: Administer corticosteroids to reduce inflammation in the airways and alleviate symptoms such as coughing and chest tightness.

treatment_plans.name: Oxygen Therapy
treatment_plans.description: Provide supplemental oxygen therapy to improve oxygen levels in the blood and alleviate symptoms of respiratory distress.

treatment_plans.name: Respiratory Therapy
treatment_plans.description: Implement respiratory therapy techniques such as chest physiotherapy and breathing exercises to help clear mucus from the airways and improve lung function.

treatment_plans.name: Monitoring and Supportive Care
treatment_plans.description: Monitor the individual's respiratory status closely and provide supportive care as needed, including rest, hydration, and symptom management.
